biotools.summary: DFTB+ is a software package for efficient approximate density functional theory based atomistic simulations. It is an implementation of the Density Functional based Tight Binding method.

bioschemas.name: DFTB+
bioschemas.summary: DFTB+ is a software package for efficient approximate density functional theory based atomistic simulations. It is an implementation of the Density Functional based Tight Binding method.
